entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 7:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon except gusting to 40 near Haro Strait. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 40 near Haro Strait. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
